actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Rules.

official_title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that there should be no recess for the House of Representatives during the remainder of the first session of the Ninety-sixth Congress.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that there should be no recess for the House during the remainder of the 1st session of the 96th Congress.

titles.title: A resolution to express the sense of the House of Representatives that there should be no recess for the House of Representatives during the remainder of the first session of the Ninety-sixth Congress.
